item.title: Oakland Ecology Master Plan
item.description: A spatial visualization of different factors affecting the implementation of an urban forestry master plan

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a 24 year old spatial data analyst, full-stack developer, and environmental advocate with 2+ years of work experience in the sustainability & waste management sectors. I have a B.Sc. from UC Berkeley with a major focusing on Environmental Data Science. I’m passionate about using technology to tackle environmental problems and to spread awareness about them! I’m a digital native with a strong background in design, marketing, GIS/ENVI, Earth Engine Beta, and data analysis/development using R, Python, and Node.

item.title: Fracking Induced Earthquakes
item.description: A comparative thesis on the production of oil/natural gas & earthquake frequency
